title: Inactive
body: So if a player is inactive for around 10-30 months then their name should be allowed to take for new players instead of buying RP or playing a ton of games to change their name to someone elses thats been inactive it should not be that hard to get a name.

replies.body: Galacius with the assist! His points are spot on, so make sure to look over that [**Summoner Name Clean Up**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914) article ^_^!

Heya Cats,

I actually have an article for you about [Summoner Name Inactivity](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914) that may help you with your issue. 

I also recommend paying particular attention to this section: 

* Each Summoner name will have 6 months of inactivity protection upon creation.
* Each Summoner name will earn an additional month of inactivity protection for each Summoner level above 6.
* Inactivity is defined to be a period in which no games of any kind have been played on the account.
* When inactivity protection expires, your name will be available to be claimed through the Summoner name Change service in the store.

I hope this helps!

Thanks,

Galacius
